    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parse(java.lang.String fileRoute)
                                                              throws KsonException,
                                                                     java.io.IOException
        Convert a kson to a HashMap.
        Parameters:
        fileRoute - The route where the file is
        Returns:
        a HashMap with the values
        Throws:
        KsonException - When the kson file doesn't respect the kson format (key:value\n)
        java.io.IOException - When the file not exists or was a IOException closing or readint the file

      • parse

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parse(java.io.BufferedReader b)
                                                              throws KsonException,
                                                                     java.io.IOException
        Convert a kson to a HashMap.
        Parameters:
        b - bufferedReader where get the kson stream
        Returns:
        a HashMap with the values. The bufferedReader is closed
        Throws:
        KsonException - When the kson file doesn't respect the kson format (key:value\n)
        java.io.IOException - When the file not exists or was a IOException closing or readint the file

      • save

        public static void save(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map,
                        java.lang.String fileRoute)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Save in a file the kson format from a map.
        Parameters:
        map - the source of the data to kson file
        fileRoute - route for put the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the file have problems or you haven't got permissions to write in this route
